text: Don't Knock the Rock is a 1956 American musical movie directed by Fred F. Sears and starring Alan Dale, Alan Freed. It features performances by Bill Haley & His Comets, Little Richard, The Treniers and Dave Appell and the Applejacks and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1956 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Fred F. Sears
title: Don't Knock the Rock
